backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and per-user transactions with authorization checks and monthly filtering and totals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file showing optional public app URL and Internet Identity provider configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, root container, and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation covering prerequisites, setup steps, and development workflow.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling identity initialization, login flow, profile setup, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen with branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/charts/IncomeVsE: Recharts bar chart visualizing monthly income versus expenses using fetched totals.
frontend/src/components/disclosures/Manu: Displays a blue info banner explaining that all transactions must be manually entered.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, page switching, bottom navigation, and a logout dialog.
frontend/src/components/month/MonthPicke: Renders previous/next month controls and displays the currently selected month and year.
frontend/src/components/notifications/Mo: Shows a dismissible reminder banner when a new month starts with a button to view the summary.
frontend/src/components/summary/MonthlyT: Fetches and displays monthly income, expenses, and balance in a styled summary card.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Form for adding a transaction with type, amount, date, and note, including validation and submission.
Loads and displays a list of monthly transactions with income/expense indicators and fallback states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile using the backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMonthlyReminder.ts: Manages monthly reminder settings tied to the user's principal, storing acknowledgment and preference state in localStorage. Provides functions to toggle reminders and mark the current month as acknowledged.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing; documents where feature-specific query hooks are located.
frontend/src/hooks/useSelectedMonth.ts: Tracks the selected month and year in localStorage and exposes setters to update them. Initializes from stored values or defaults to the current month.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Defines React Query hooks for adding transactions and fetching month-specific transactions and totals via an actor API. Invalidates relevant queries on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark mode design tokens using a warm green palette. Applies global base styles and variable-driven theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App. Imports global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders settings UI showing user profile, notification preferences for monthly reminders, and app info with copy-link functionality. Pulls data from identity, profile, and reminder hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SummaryPage.tsx: Displays a monthly summary with totals, balance highlight, and charts, acknowledging the month when viewed. Uses selected month, totals query, and reminder logic.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows month picker, disclosure, monthly totals, chart preview, transaction form toggle, and transaction list. Relies on selected month state and allows adding transactions.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Implements clipboard copy utility using the modern Clipboard API with a textarea-based fallback. Returns success status as a boolean.
frontend/src/utils/getPublicAppUrl.ts: Returns the appâ€™s public URL using an env var if available, otherwise falling back to window.location.origin.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables used by the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing build issues, feature requirements, and deployment stabilization goals.
